name: @jasonlwalker/jlwutility
description: Utility library for HTML5 web applications that use JQuery, Bootstrap, Bootbox, Font-Awesome, and Toastr

scripts.msbuild: npm config set script-shell 'C:\Program Files\git\bin\bash.exe' && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run version:bump --silent && rm -f libJlwUtility.min.js && npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run version:add --silent
scripts.version:add:
echo "/* Jlw Utility Library $(npm run version:extract --silent)
* Â©2012-2023 Jason L Walker 
* Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S')
*/
$(cat libJlwUtility.min.js)" > libJlwUtility.min.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
